Ratings.comment: VERY HARD GRADER. Everything needs to be critically analyzed through and through in order for you to maybe get a 90%. Not a lot of point opportunities, must work hard for a decent grade. This class should not be as hard as it is. She should be teaching a higher level class for her expectations.

Worse Teacher Ever - Chip on Her Shoulder.  Snippy Emails. Made up class all subjective to her personal point of view.  Very little direction.  Left everything up to her Assistant.  Run Away from her!
